front.title: IS-IS Extensions for MPLS Virtual Nodes and Virtual Links

abstract.t: MPLS plays a key role in the process of implementing network virtualization. [I-D.li-mpls-network-virtualization-framework] proposes the framework to implement MPLS virtual network based on the architecture of central controller IGP. This document defines the corresponding IS-IS protocol extension and procedures to implement virtual nodes node and virtual link based on MPLS global label.
